ModMetaData.name: More Psychic Sensitivity Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
The psychic genes bug me. Based on my mod releases a lot of genes bug me, but psychic genes deserve a special mention right next to delicate and extra pain, amongst others that follow that pattern. Well this mod aims to fix this by doing two things. First, traits are gone and replaced by stats, so now you can give your people double psychic dullness. Second, it adds more options for psychic enhancements that follow the same pattern as the two you can have by default.
An example of following the same pattern, psy-sensitive gives +10% sensitivity for 2 points, well now you can get 5% for 1. That's a .5 for .5 value!
What, did you think I was going to give you a 2 for 1 promotional value?

Pesky numbers for those who want specifics Psychically Deaf - -100% sensitivity, -10% meditation focus gain, -10% Neural Heat Recovery Rate Psychically Dull - -50% sensitivity, -5% meditation focus gain, -5% Neural Heat Recovery Rate Slightly psy-sensitive - bio -1, +10% sensitivity, +5% meditation focus gain, +5% Neural Heat Recovery Rate Very psy-sensitive - bio -3, +27% sensitivity, +13% meditation focus gain, +13% Neural Heat Recovery Rate Exceptionally psy-sensitive - bio -4, +33% sensitivity, +17% meditation focus gain, +17% Neural Heat Recovery Rate Extremely psy-sensitive - bio -6, +50% sensitivity, +25% meditation focus gain, +25% Neural Heat Recovery Rate, Mental Break Threshold +5%, Constant 10% Pain
